titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for home office expenses where the taxpayer's sole fixed business location is in the home.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction for home office expenses where the taxpayer's sole fixed location of business is in the home of the taxpayer.
